set.name: Global Series: Jiang Yanggu and Mu Yanling

property.name: Type
property.value: Legendary Planeswalker

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+2]: Target creature can't be blocked this turn. −3: Draw two cards. −1[0]: Tap all creatures your opponents control. You take an extra turn after this one.

property.name: Artist
property.value: 林玄泰

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: These nimble sparrows, not often seen, delight in tricking the pangolins that wander the forest.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Kee Lo

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Purple-Crystal Crab dies, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A precious shell without, a delicious taste within.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Tan Yan Yao

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Fish Lizard

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vivid Flying Fish has flying as long as it's attacking. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The rainbow seen above the Great Lake of Cloud Dream just after the rain is nothing but the vivid-colored flying fishes' ritual dance.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Tingting Yeh

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Welkin Tern can block only creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It stops flying only as its life comes to an end.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Yutaka Li

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Whenever Heavenly Qilin attacks, another target creature you control gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It strides through the universe as though stepping on the stars, crossing freely between the celestial and earthly worlds.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Xin-Yu Liu

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not all enormous beasts are quick to anger.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Tingting Yeh

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Fox Spirit

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Nine-Tail White Fox deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It has waited a millennium just for you, and for a millennium will it watch over your descendants.

property.name: Artist
property.value: 林玄泰

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Earth-Origin Yak enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Deep in the Northern Mountains, the yaks linger silently, channeling the powers of the earth.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Tan Yan Yao

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as you control a Yanling planeswalker, Moon-Eating Dog has flying. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The most nimble of creatures, it chases the most sacred luminence.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Tingting Yeh

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The spirits of all the rivers and oceans came together as an unstoppable force, unleashing their fury as lightning and thunder.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Kee Lo

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever one or more creatures you control attack, you gain 1 life for each attacking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is said that Yinglong gave birth to the qilin and the phoenix, and after them, all the hairy and winged beings in the world. Thus it is known as the Ancestor Dragon.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Shinchuen Chen

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't be blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mystery lies beneath the haunting mists. Never stay where obscurity deepens.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Tingting Yeh

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Interesting . . . This mortal being seems to have been blessed with Qilin's essence." - Mu Yanling's journal

property.name: Artist
property.value: Wolk Sheep

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "From the swallows, I learned how to ride the winds to anywhere, and from my tears, I mastered how to harness the water."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Pon Lee

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dragon's Presence deals 5 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Ancestor Dragon appeared atop the clouds, amid shattering mountains and sundering earth." - Jiang Yanggu's travelogue

property.name: Artist
property.value: Tan Yan Yao

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A heaven-sent vision is like a lantern to guide the way.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Yutaka Li

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return up to two target creatures to their owner's hand. Search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Mu Yanling, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you searched your library this way, shuffle.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Xin-Yu Liu

property.name: Rules
property.value: Meandering River enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Clouds and mists cover the lake as though it were a dreamland. When the wind rises, the mists disperse, opening great vistas of rippling reeds.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Gaga Zeng

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. −1: If you don't control a creature named Mowu, create Mowu, a legendary 3/3 green Dog creature token. −5: Until end of turn, target creature gains trample and gets +X/+X, where X is the number of lands you control.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Tingting Yeh

property.name: Flavor
property.value: This strange beast has the hide of a leopard, the howl of a dog, and the horns of an ox.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Shinchuen Chen

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Two bodies, twice the malice.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Qiu De En

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}{G}, {T}: You gain 4 life. Activate only if you control a Yanggu planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The pale deer are believed to have lived a thousand years, the pure white five hundred more. Those who seek them would gladly wander the wilds forever for the merest glimpse of these sacred beings.

property.name: Artist
property.value: G-host Lee

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Reckless Pangolin attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A pangolin's power grows with its speed. Strike when you have the chance!" - Jiang Yanggu's travelogue

property.name: Artist
property.value: Wolk Sheep

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The welcoming appearance of the Arrow Bamboo Forest masks its deathly hostility.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Qiu De En

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Cat Beast

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Known for their glowing horn and stone-rattling roar, zheng are the fiercest predators in the forest. Few survived before Jiang Yanggu came.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Yutaka Li

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Bird Spirit

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Whenever Fire-Omen Crane attacks, it deals 1 damage to target creature an opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If you can see it clearly, you're already on fire.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Tan Yan Yao

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {2}{R}: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its wings are a heavenly inferno that sets the world ablaze.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Tingting Yeh

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For reasons unknown to me, herds in the Arrow Bamboo Forest have become more and more agitated." - Jiang Yanggu's travelogue

property.name: Artist
property.value: Shinchuen Chen

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A pangolin's scales are resistant to all sorts of damage and weaponry. Desire for them threatens to drive the pangolin to extinction.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Tan Yan Yao

property.name: Rules
property.value: Breath of Fire deals 2 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fire leads to more fire.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Xin-Yu Liu

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Mowu was wary that day, as though he sensed the danger ahead." - Jiang Yanggu's travelogue

property.name: Artist
property.value: Wolk Sheep

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +4/+4 and gains trample until end of turn. (It can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Prepare for battle!" - Jiang Yanggu

property.name: Artist
property.value: Shinchuen Chen

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library and graveyard for a basic land card and a card named Jiang Yanggu, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As my hands touched it, I realized that I had not found it - it had been leading me here."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Qiu De En

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cleansing Screech deals 4 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Crackle" and "pop" are the most wondrous sounds.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Tingting Yeh

property.name: Rules
property.value: Timber Gorge enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Near the Western Seas lies Mount Zhaoyao - a forest of stones that reaches the clouds, a bountiful land of wondrous treasures and strange animals.
